message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a very competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand about your budget, Bob, but the product is worth a lot more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $13,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $13,000?
